name: office
description: Generate Office documents (DOCX, XLSX, PDF, PPTX) with TypeScript. Pure JS libraries that work everywhere: Claude Code CLI, Cloudflare Workers, browsers. Uses docx (Word), xlsx/SheetJS (Excel), pdf-lib (PDF), pptxgenjs (PowerPoint). Use when: creating presentations, invoices, reports, spreadsheets, or troubleshooting Packer.toBuffer, XLSX.utils, PDFDocument, pptxgenjs errors.
